name: Beer Run (itch)
description:
Beer Run is a joke game, meaning it was just a little stupid project I made for fun to just laugh a little, but if you want to comment, go ahead.

Controls:

- Left Mouse to interact with objects that show "Grab"

- "F" Key to interact with the car when it shows "Drive!", walk into the car

- "E" Key when looking at the beer case to drink beer

Tips:

Stay away from the Pie Planet pickup truck, you'll know it when you see it, it's loud.

If you die, press any key to reset, it's easy to die, so drive slowly. 

Good Luck!
